title._content: Image taken from page 114 of 'Description des villes et campagnes du département de l'Yonne. Recueil de notices historiques, biographiques, géographiques, géologiques, agricoles ... IIe volume. Arrondissement d'Avallon'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Description des villes et campagnes du département de l'Yonne. Recueil de notices historiques, biographiques, géographiques, géologiques, agricoles ... IIe volume. Arrondissement d'Avallon" Author: PETIT, Victor Jean Baptiste. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10172.g.31." Page: 114 Place of Publishing: Auxerre Date of Publishing: 1870 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002887353 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
